tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BiodiversityData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    conservation_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ConservationEfforts (
  effort_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  conservation_area VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  conservation_budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Observations (
  observation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  observer_name VARCHAR(255),
  observation_date DATE,
  species_id INT,
  area_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES Species(species_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES ConservationAreas(area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE biodiversity_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name STRING,
  location STRING,
  date_observed DATE
)

CREATE TABLE conservation_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name STRING,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring_sites (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name STRING,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE researchers (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name STRING,
  affiliation STRING,
  expertise STRING
)

CREATE TABLE Species (
  species_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT NOT NULL,
  classification TEXT,
  kingdom TEXT,
  conservation_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Locations (
  location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT NOT NULL,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Observations (
  observation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id UUID REFERENCES Species(species_id),
  location_id UUID REFERENCES Locations(location_id),
  observer_name TEXT,
  observation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Habitats (
  habitat_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ConservationStatus (
  status_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id UUID REFERENCES Species(species_id),
  status TEXT
)
